welcome to bookishly!

Hello! My name is Claire! I'm 26 and live in the Chicago 'burbs. I love to read fantasy and sci-fi books, with well-rounded characters, and rich world building! Reading allows me to escape the real world, and enter worlds where I can be magnificent!
I hope you enjoy my thoughts and feelings!

Theres Something About Mira

Sonali Dev

ðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸ

I wasn't too sure about this book going into it! When I started reading it, I was feeling a huge disconect with the characters because thier culture was so different from mine. However once the plot started to pick up, and there were mysterys to unravel between our characters, I was instantly hooked! This book was a slow burn for sure. The connection between the past and the present, and finding out who you are at your core was so beautiful.
